entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
